- - - - 110 Clean Clean false false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Dorothy, Thank so much for updating the info we will let you know if we have any trouble with the new info. Dorado usually pays within the net 30 days per their contract with us. They have had your invoice now for 8 days: Page 1 of 1 (50 items per page) Invoice <https://app1.mbopartners.com/servlet/entry?display=InvoiceSelectMember&sort=0>Start/ End DateAmountBalanceInvoice Date <https://app1.mbopartners.com/servlet/entry?display=InvoiceSelectMember&sort=2>Days Outstanding364795 <https://app1.mbopartners.com/servlet/entry?display=InvoiceUpdateMember&id=20120507183846065983000000> <javascript:companyNotePopupWindow(>04/16/12 04/30/128,543.858,543.8505/07/128Description: Beattie, Dorothy Domaine ARC, Inc. DoradoCompany: CoreLogic Dorado CorporationTotal8,543.858,543.85 When we receive the payment you will be notified via email. Let me know if you would like me to reach out and ask the account manager if it is possible to expedite this as there were some delays with your set up for drug tests etc. Thanks!Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> Dorothy B [mailto:beattie_dorothy@hotmail.com] Sent: Monday, May 14, 2012 6:39 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: RE: prenote rejection for Dorothy Beattie (20670) Hello Sara I have updated the bank info. Somehow it was entered with an account that included the ABA#... Anyway- it should work now.
This is a local bank and they watch the accounts like a hawk- so they may STILL reject it unless I phone them... let me know.
Thanks Dorothy
PS- How long does Dorado usually take to PAY an invoice- do you know? From: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> To: beattie_dorothy@hotmail.com <mailto:beattie_dorothy@hotmail.com> Date: Mon, 14 May 2012 17:52:44 -0400 Subject: FW: prenote rejection for Dorothy Beattie (20670)Hi Dorothy, The bank account number we have on file for your account was rejected by the bank. Can you log in and update it by clicking on “payments” (top grey menu) and then “direct deposit” (left menu bar.) Please let me know if you have any questions. Thanks!Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. Hello Sara, ADP has received notification from your employee's bank that a direct deposit pre-note item has been rejected. Corrections to your employee's bank information are necessary in order for the employee to receive a direct deposit in the future. Changes are required when the bank receives invalid account numbers, incorrect transaction (deduction) codes, account number changes or amendments due to bank mergers and acquisitions.
The details for the rejected pre-note items by employee, with reason for return are outlined below.
File no Type RR Check Date Return Code Description 020670 PREN R03 5/11/2012 No Account
